ca.uhn.fhir.store

Interface IAuditDataStore


  • public interface IAuditDataStore
    This interface provides a way to persist FHIR SecurityEvents to any kind of data store

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void store(BaseSecurityEvent auditEvent)
      Take in a SecurityEvent object and handle storing it to a persistent data store (database, JMS, file, etc).

    • Method Detail

      • store

        void store(BaseSecurityEvent auditEvent)
           throws Exception
        Take in a SecurityEvent object and handle storing it to a persistent data store (database, JMS, file, etc).
        Parameters:
        auditEvent - a FHIR SecurityEvent to be persisted
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is an error while persisting the data
